description.original: Finds what you are looking for in the selected text and replaces it with the specified text
description.translation: 在所选文本中查找您要查找的内容，并将其替换为指定的文本

dict.name: 'Find and replace in selection': name: '在选中的内容中查找和替换'
dict.text: 'Find and replace in selection - S: text: '在选中的内容中查找和替换—设置'
dict..setDesc('Type \"gmi\" for global, multi: .setDesc('键入"gmi" 表示开启 全局、多行、大小写不敏感')
